experiences.title: Service Manager
experiences.description: Leading teams of students through nightclubs, pubs and miscellaneous events thorough their shift. My role is to ensure the team is fully equipped with all necessary knowledge, including their position and according laws, to make it through the night!

experiences.title: IT-Consultant
experiences.description: Full-time consultant through Academic Work as an internal second-line IT-technician at the swedish Police Authority.

experiences.title: IT-Technician
experiences.description: Gig-job, composed of mixed assignments in various areas of home-tech. Most assignments involve troubleshooting and maintenance of network devices and home PCs. Others consist of WiFi set-up in single houses and/or areas, installation of hardware on PCs and servers, and installation of various devices such as TVs and home entertainment systems.

experiences.title: Receptionist
experiences.description: Summer job as a night receptionist at Ad Astra by Elite, where I met and assisted guests with Check-in/-out, bookings and general tourism info.

experiences.title: Receptionist
experiences.description: Receptionist and Generalist at Almnäs Park Hotel. The main work includes check-ins/check-outs, as well as helping customers and company associates by assessing with tasks and miscellaneous questions regarding the hotel and nearby city. The job also included an administrative aspect such as responding to E-mails, booking services to guest requests, and handling simpler economic reports.

experiences.title: IT-Technician
experiences.description: Part-time job consisting of assistance with IoT devices, software, and hardware installation, both internally and externally. Assisting other employees with montage and dismantling of audio and visual devices was a frequent part of the job.

experiences.title: Waiter
experiences.description: A job with somewhat mixed responsibilities, mainly taking and serving orders to customers in the hotel's restaurant, preparing the breakfast buffet, and simply ensuring all guests a satisfying experience.

projects.title: This website!
projects.description: My CV as a website, make with Vue and Tailwind CSS!

projects.title: RSS-feed program for podcasts
projects.description: An RSS-feed capturing software as a univeristy project, utilizing repository patterns, serialization and a three-layer architecture

projects.title: Website for a student union
projects.description: A re-design of a website for SOBRA; a student union section at Örebro University.

projects.title: Website for a game dev
projects.description: A website made with (mostly) pure HTML, CSS and JS, with some instances of VueJs as part of a course. A live version's available at the link, while the source code's available on my GitHub!

projects.title: Java app for a hatmaker
projects.description: As part of a course, my group and I created a simple program for a fictional hatmaker, including order management, a sample database and login functionality.
